item.title: US Oil Imports: A Tale of One Country
item.description: Three years ago oil prices were in the $90’s. They now move between the $40’s and $50’s. US oil production was on the rise three years ago, and it continued to rise for one year after the initial price decline, reaching 9.4 million barells per day (mbpd) in 2015. In 2016, oil production dropped to 8.8 mbpd, and production through the first six months of 2017 has averaged nearly 9.
